itunesq

Class PlaylistCollection

  • Object
    • PlaylistCollection

  • public final class PlaylistCollection
extends Object
    Class that performs various operations on a collection of playlists.

    This is a final class consisting entirely of static methods.

    Author:
    Jon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlaylistCollection() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void initializeLogging()
      Initializes logging.
      static boolean isPlaylistIgnored(String playlistName)
      Determines if a playlist should be ignored.
      static void markBypassedPlaylists()
      Finds and marks all playlists that are bypassed by user preferences.
      static void modifyIgnoredPlaylists(List<String> prevIgnoredPlaylists, List<String> newIgnoredPlaylists)
      Modifies the ignored status for all playlists according to the preferences.
      static void setPlaylistFolderCounts()
      Sets the playlist folder content count for all folder playlists.
      static void updateTrackPlaylistInfo()
      Updates the track playlist info for all playlists that are not ignored.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaylistCollection

        public PlaylistCollection()

    • Method Detail

      • initializeLogging

        public static void initializeLogging()
        Initializes logging. This is called once at application initialization.

      • modifyIgnoredPlaylists

        public static void modifyIgnoredPlaylists(List<String> prevIgnoredPlaylists,
                                          List<String> newIgnoredPlaylists)
        Modifies the ignored status for all playlists according to the preferences. This is called if the ignored preferences are changed.
        Parameters:
        prevIgnoredPlaylists - list of ignored playlists before being changed
        newIgnoredPlaylists - list of ignored playlists after being changed

      • isPlaylistIgnored

        public static boolean isPlaylistIgnored(String playlistName)
        Determines if a playlist should be ignored.
        Parameters:
        playlistName - name of the playlist to check
        Returns:
        true if the playlist should be ignored, otherwise false

      • setPlaylistFolderCounts

        public static void setPlaylistFolderCounts()
        Sets the playlist folder content count for all folder playlists. This indicates the number of playlists contained in a folder. We need this so that the number of playlists can be properly adjusted if folder playlists are dynamically added to or removed from the ignored list.

      • markBypassedPlaylists

        public static void markBypassedPlaylists()
        Finds and marks all playlists that are bypassed by user preferences.

      • updateTrackPlaylistInfo

        public static void updateTrackPlaylistInfo()
        Updates the track playlist info for all playlists that are not ignored. The playlist info consists of the playlist name and a bypassed indicator.
